entities: United Nations Assistance Mission in Somalia
summary:
The Security Council:

Recalling previous resolutions on Somalia, 
Decides to authorize the African Union to maintain AMISOM deployment until 31 July 2018, 
to take necessary measures in compliance with international law, respecting Somalia's sovereignty, 
and to carry out its mandate as set out in resolution 2372 (2017); 
Authorizes a uniformed personnel level of 20,626, including 1,040 AMISOM police personnel, 
by 30 October 2018; 

Requests the Secretary-General to continue logistical support for AMISOM, 
and 70 AMISOM civilians, 10,900 Somalia National Army on joint operations, 
and the United Nations Assistance Mission in Somalia; 

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
